original_text: Do not marry your wife's sister as a second wife. If your wife is still alive, do not have sex with her sister.
korean_text: 너는 아내가 생존할 동안에 그의 자매를 데려다가 그의 하체를 범하여 그로 질투하게 하지 말지니라

sentences.original_text: Do not marry your wife's sister
If your wife is still alive
do not have sex with her sister
